declarations.description: A component to display a breadcrumb trail.
declarations.name: Breadcrumbs

members.name: collapseThreshold
members.description: The threshold for when breadcrumbs should be collapsed into a menu.

members.name: homeUrl
members.description:
The url for the home link, defaults to the root url.

By changing this static property you can change the default value for
all future instances of the component. Changing the static property
won't affect already created instances.

members.name: homeUrl
members.description:
The url for the home link, defaults to the root url.

If you want to change the default value for all future instances of the component,
you can change the static property. If you want to change the property of an already
created instance, you need to change this property.

members.name: inverted
members.description: Inverts the colors of the component so it works on a dark/light background.

members.name: noHome
members.description:
When true doesn't show a home link as the first breadcrumb.

By changing this static property you can change the default value for
all future instances of the component. Changing the static property
won't affect already created instances.

members.name: noHome
members.description:
When true doesn't show a home link as the first breadcrumb.

If you want to change the default value for all future instances of the component,
you can change the static property. If you want to change the property of an already
created instance, you need to change this property.

attributes.name: home-url
attributes.description:
The url for the home link, defaults to the root url.

By changing this static property you can change the default value for
all future instances of the component. Changing the static property
won't affect already created instances.

attributes.name: inverted
attributes.description: Inverts the colors of the component so it works on a dark/light background.

attributes.name: no-home
attributes.description:
When true doesn't show a home link as the first breadcrumb.

By changing this static property you can change the default value for
all future instances of the component. Changing the static property
won't affect already created instances.

fields.name: #observer
fields.description:
Observe changes in size, so we can check whether we need to show tooltips
for truncated links.

fields.name: collapseThreshold
fields.description: The threshold for when breadcrumbs should be collapsed into a menu.
